titles.title: All Creatures Of Our God And King

authors.author: St. Francis of Assisi William Henry Draper

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All creatures of our God and King,
Lift up your voice and with us sing,
Alleluia! Alleluia!
Thou burning sun with golden beam,
Thou silver moon with softer gleam,
O praise Him, O praise Him!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou rushing wind that art so strong,
Ye clouds that sail in heaven along,
O praise Him! Alleluia!
Thou rising morn, in praise rejoice;
Ye lights of evening, find a voice!
O praise Him, O praise Him!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thou flowing water, pure and clear,
Make music for thy Lord to hear.
Alleluia! Alleluia!
Thou fire so masterful and bright,
Thou givest man both warmth and light!
O praise Him, O praise Him!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And all ye men of tender heart,
Forgiving others take your part.
O sing ye! Alleluia!
Ye who long pain and sorrow bear,
Praise God and on Him cast your care!
O praise Him, O praise Him!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Let all things their Creator bless,
And worship Him in humbleness.
O praise Him! Alleluia!
Praise, praise the Father, praise the Son,
And praise the Spirit, Three in One!
O praise Him! O praise Him!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Earth ever fertile day by day,
Bring forth Your blessings on our way,
O praise Him! Alleluia!
All fruit and crops that richly grow,
All trees and flowers God's glory show.
O praise Him! O praise Him!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
People and nations take your part,
Love and forgive with all your heart,
Alleluia! Alleluia!
All who long pain and sorrow bear,
Trust God and cast on Him your care.
O praise Him! O praise Him!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Death once the ancient enemy,
Hear now our Easter melody,
O praise Him! Alleluia!
You are the pathway home to God,
Our door to life through Christ our Lord.
O praise Him! O praise Him!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Praise God from whom all blessings flow;
Praise Him all creatures here below;
O praise Him! Alleluia!
Praise Him above ye heavenly hosts,
Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost.
O praise Him, O praise Him!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Dear mother earth, who day by day
Unfoldest blessings on our way,
O praise Him! Alleluia!
The flowers and fruits that in Thee grow,
Let them His glory also show;
O praise Him, O praise Him!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
And thou, most kind and gentle death,
Waiting to hush our latest breath,
O praise Him, Alleluia!
Thou leadest home the child of God,
And Christ our Lord the way hath trod;
O praise Him, O praise Him!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!
